Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, Jeb42 here! I'm from the UK and I've been playing (if you can call my tactic of explosions and devastation that) KSP on and off for a year or so now... I mostly enjoy building space stations, and realistic craft. First, a couple of admissions:

  • I've never gotten a Kerbal to the Mun and back
  • I use Mechjeb for my orbital maneuvers- too long otherwise
  • I've only ever watched 1 Scott Manley video

And yes, I know my name is completely unoriginal and bland
I have killed Jeb quite a few times, but I don't think I'm up to 42 of him yet. Welcome to the forum.
